query:
SELECT 
  pt.id,
  pt.txid,
  pt.amount,
  pt.status,
  pt.createdAt,
  c.id as customerId,
  c.email,
  c.balance
FROM pix_transactions pt
JOIN customers c ON pt.customerId = c.id
WHERE pt.status = 'pending'
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
